pr_title: Add distributor bucket db memory usage metrics

timeline.message: Add memory usage metrics for distributor bucket databases
Use common MemoryUsageMetrics in searchcore as well

timeline.bodyText: Consider changing description to match metric name: "<= allocated_bytes"
timeline.author: geirst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+// Copyright 2017 Yahoo Holdings. Licensed under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license. See LICENSE in the project root.
+
+#include "memory_usage_metrics.h"
+#include <vespa/vespalib/util/memoryusage.h>
+
+namespace metrics {
+
+MemoryUsageMetrics::MemoryUsageMetrics(metrics::MetricSet* parent)
+    : MetricSet("memory_usage", {}, "The memory usage for a given component", parent),
+      _allocated_bytes("allocated_bytes", {}, "The number of allocated bytes", this),
+      _used_bytes("used_bytes", {}, "The number of used bytes (<= allocatedbytes)", this),

timeline.bodyText: Consider changing description to match metric name: "<= used_bytes"
timeline.author: geirst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+// Copyright 2017 Yahoo Holdings. Licensed under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license. See LICENSE in the project root.
+
+#include "memory_usage_metrics.h"
+#include <vespa/vespalib/util/memoryusage.h>
+
+namespace metrics {
+
+MemoryUsageMetrics::MemoryUsageMetrics(metrics::MetricSet* parent)
+    : MetricSet("memory_usage", {}, "The memory usage for a given component", parent),
+      _allocated_bytes("allocated_bytes", {}, "The number of allocated bytes", this),
+      _used_bytes("used_bytes", {}, "The number of used bytes (<= allocatedbytes)", this),
+      _dead_bytes("dead_bytes", {}, "The number of dead bytes (<= usedbytes)", this),

timeline.bodyText: I think "type" could interfere with other dimension names. Consider "bucket_db_type" instead?
timeline.author: geirst

timeline.message: Improve dimension naming and metric descriptions
